text:
[Verse]
Midnight on the freeway
City lights they guide us
Radio is playing
Feel the night inside us

[Verse 2]
Stars above they twinkle
Wind runs through our hair
Every turn and corner
Freedom in the air

[Chorus]
Let’s just keep on driving
Hearts are set on fire
Together we’re surviving
Living our desire

[Bridge]
Moonlight paints the road
In silver and in gold
Stories yet untold
In our hands we hold

[Verse 3]
No time for sleeping
Eyes on the horizon
Dreamers not retreating
Always improvising

[Chorus]
Let’s just keep on driving
Hearts are set on fire
Together we’re surviving
Living our desire
title: Midnight Drive
